    /* 
    -----------------------------------------------
    THEME: LYNO SOCIAL PRO
    DEVELOPER: George Bahgat
    VERSION: 5.5.0
    -----------------------------------------------
    */
    
    /* Variable Definitions for Theme Designer */
    /* <Group description="Site Branding" title="Site Branding">
       <Variable name="site.name" description="Site Name" type="string" default="LYNO PRO" value="LYNO PRO"/>
       <Variable name="site.logo" description="Logo URL (Icon instead of Text)" type="string" default="" value=""/>
    </Group> */

    :root {
        --primary: #4f46e5;
        --secondary: #ec4899;
        --accent: #22c55e;
        --bg: #0b0d11;
        --surface: #15181e;
        --card-bg: #1c2128;
        --text: #f9fafb;
        --text-sub: #b1b8c5; /* Improved contrast for dark */
        --border: rgba(255,255,255,0.06);
        --glass: rgba(11, 13, 17, 0.7);
        --blur: 16px;
        --radius: 20px;
        --container: 1440px;
        --transition: transform 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1), opacity 0.4s ease, box-shadow 0.4s ease, border-color 0.4s ease;
        --shadow: 0 20px 40px -10px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
    }
    
    [data-theme="light"] {
        --bg: #f5f7fa;
        --surface: #ffffff;
        --card-bg: #ffffff;
        --text: #1e293b;
        --text-sub: #475569; /* Improved contrast for light */
        --border: rgba(0,0,0,0.06);
        --glass: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85);
        --shadow: 0 12px 30px -10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08), 0 4px 12px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.03);
    }

    /* Base Setup */
    * { margin:0; padding:0; box-sizing:border-box; outline:none; }
    html { scroll-behavior: smooth; }
    body {
        background: var(--bg);
        color: var(--text);
        font-family: 'Outfit', 'Cairo', sans-serif;
        font-size: 15px;
        line-height: normal;
        overflow-x: hidden;
    }
    a { text-decoration: none; color: inherit; transition: var(--transition); }
    ul { list-style: none; }
    img { display: block; max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: var(--radius); }

    /* Custom Scrollbar */
    ::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 6px; }
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background: var(--bg); }
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: var(--border); border-radius: 10px; }
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover { background: var(--primary); }

    .app-container { max-width: var(--container); margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; }

    /* 
    ========================================
    1. HEADER (Social Style Sticky)
    ========================================
    */
    .header-social {
        position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 70px;
        background: var(--glass);
        backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur)); -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur));
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border);
        z-index: 2000;
        display: flex; align-items: center;
    }
    .header-inner { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; width: 100%; }

    .brand-logo { 
        font-size: 26px; font-weight: 900; letter-spacing: -1.5px; 
        display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; cursor: pointer;
    }
    .brand-logo i { color: var(--primary); filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.4)); }
    .brand-logo:hover { transform: scale(1.05); }

    /* Search Bar */
    .header-search {
        background: var(--surface);
        border: 1px solid var(--border);
        border-radius: 50px;
        padding: 0 20px;
        height: 40px;
        display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px;
        width: 400px;
        transition: var(--transition);
    }
    .header-search:focus-within { border-color: var(--primary); box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.1); width: 450px; }
    .header-search input { background: none; border: none; color: var(--text); font-size: 14px; width: 100%; }
    .header-search i { color: var(--text-sub); }

    .nav-actions { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 15px; }

    .nav-link-btn {
        width: 45px; height: 45px; border-radius: 50%;
        display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
        background: var(--surface); border: 1px solid var(--border);
        color: var(--text-sub); font-size: 18px; cursor: pointer;
    }
    .nav-link-btn:hover { background: var(--primary); color: #fff; transform: translateY(-3px); box-shadow: 0 8px 20px -5px rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.4); }

    /* Cards & Widgets Baselines */
    .nav-card, .side-widget, .social-card, .post-view {
        box-shadow: var(--shadow);
    }

    /* 
    ========================================
    2. MAIN GRID (The Feed Layout)
    ========================================
    */
    .main-grid {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 280px 1fr 320px;
        gap: 30px;
        margin-top: 100px;
        margin-bottom: 50px;
    }

    /* Left Sidebar */
    .left-side { position: sticky; top: 100px; height: calc(100vh - 120px); }
    .nav-card { background: var(--surface); border: 1px solid var(--border); border-radius: var(--radius); padding: 15px; margin-bottom: 20px; transition: var(--transition); }
    .nav-card:hover { border-color: var(--primary); }
    .nav-item { 
        display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 15px; padding: 12px 15px; 
        border-radius: 12px; font-weight: 600; color: var(--text-sub); margin-bottom: 5px;
    }
    .nav-item i { width: 24px; font-size: 20px; text-align: center; color: var(--primary); }
    [data-theme="light"] .nav-item i { 
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary), var(--secondary));
        -webkit-background-clip: text;
        -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    }
    .nav-item:hover, .nav-item.active { background: rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.08); color: var(--primary); }
    .nav-item.active { background: var(--primary); color: #fff; box-shadow: 0 8px 20px -5px rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.4); }
    .nav-item.active i { color: #fff !important; -webkit-text-fill-color: #fff !important; }

    /* Center Feed */
    .content-feed { display: flex; flex-direction: column; } 

    /* AdSense Slot Wrapper */
    .adsense-wrapper { 
        background: var(--surface); border: 1px dashed var(--border); 
        padding: 20px; border-radius: var(--radius); text-align: center; 
        min-height: 100px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
        margin-bottom: 30px; overflow: hidden; position: relative;
    }
    .adsense-label { display: none; }

    /* 
    ========================================
    3. THE SOCIAL POST CARD
    ========================================
    */
    .social-card {
        background: var(--surface);
        border: 1px solid var(--border);
        border-radius: var(--radius);
        overflow: hidden;
        transition: var(--transition);
        position: relative;
        margin-bottom: 60px; /* Strong spacing for social feed */
        content-visibility: auto; contain-intrinsic-size: 1px 400px;
    }
    .social-card:hover { transform: translateY(-8px); border-color: rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.2); box-shadow: 0 30px 60px -15px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); }
    [data-theme="dark"] .social-card:hover { box-shadow: 0 30px 60px -15px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); }

    .card-top { padding: 12px 18px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border); }
    .author-info { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px; }
    .author-avatar { width: 36px; height: 36px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; border: 1px solid var(--border); }
    .author-name { font-weight: 700; font-size: 13px; }
    .post-time { font-size: 10px; color: var(--text-sub); margin-top: 1px; }

    .card-img-wrap { position: relative; width: 100%; height: 420px; display: block; overflow: hidden; background: #1e293b; } /* Reduced from 500px */
    .card-img-wrap img { width: 101%; height: 101%; object-fit: cover; transition: 1.2s cubic-bezier(0.2, 0.8, 0.2, 1); border-radius: 0 !important; margin: -0.5%; }
    .social-card:hover .card-img-wrap img { transform: scale(1.05); }

    /* Floating Glass Box Overlay for Title */
    .content-overlay {
        position: absolute; bottom: 15px; left: 15px; right: 15px;
        background: rgba(11, 13, 17, 0.6);
        backdrop-filter: blur(20px); -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
        padding: 18px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
        transition: var(--transition);
        z-index: 10;
    }
    .social-card:hover .content-overlay { bottom: 20px; background: rgba(11, 13, 17, 0.8); }
    
    .post-title a::after {
        content: "";
        position: absolute;
        top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0;
        z-index: 1;
    }
    .post-title a::after {
        /* This expands the link to cover the entire card-img-wrap */
        margin: -420px -15px -15px -15px;
        height: 420px;
    }


    .post-label { 
        display: inline-block; background: var(--primary); color: #fff; 
        font-size: 10px; font-weight: 800; padding: 4px 10px; border-radius: 5px; 
        margin-bottom: 10px; text-transform: uppercase;
    }

    .post-title { font-size: 19px; font-weight: 800; line-height: 1.3; margin-bottom: 6px; color: #fff; }
    .post-title a:hover { color: var(--primary); }

    /* Card Social Actions (Like, Views) */
    .card-social-stats { padding: 12px 18px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; border-top: 1px solid var(--border); background: rgba(0,0,0,0.05); }
    .stats-left { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 18px; }
    .stat-item { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 600; color: var(--text-sub); cursor: pointer; transition: 0.2s; }
    .stat-item i { font-size: 16px; }
    .stat-item:hover { color: var(--primary); }
    .stat-item.liked { color: #f43f5e; }
    .stat-item.liked i { animation: heartBeat 0.4s ease; }

    @keyframes heartBeat {
        0% { transform: scale(1); }
        50% { transform: scale(1.3); }
        100% { transform: scale(1); }
    }

    .views-count { font-size: 13px; color: var(--text-sub); display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 5px; }

    /* 
    ========================================
    4. RIGHT SIDEBAR (Widgets)
    ========================================
    */
    .right-side { position: sticky; top: 100px; }
    .side-widget { background: var(--surface); border: 1px solid var(--border); border-radius: var(--radius); padding: 20px; margin-bottom: 25px; }
    .widget-head { font-size: 16px; font-weight: 800; margin-bottom: 18px; position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px; }
    .widget-head::after { content:''; flex: 1; height: 1px; background: var(--border); }

    /* Topics with Scroll */
    .topics-scroll { max-height: 350px; overflow-y: auto; padding-right: 5px; }
    .topics-scroll::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 4px; }
    .topic-item { 
        display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; 
        padding: 10px 12px; background: var(--bg); border-radius: 10px; 
        margin-bottom: 8px; border: 1px solid transparent; transition: 0.2s;
    }
    .topic-item:hover { border-color: var(--primary); background: rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.05); }
    .topic-name { font-size: 13px; font-weight: 600; }
    .topic-count { font-size: 11px; background: var(--surface); border: 1px solid var(--border); padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 20px; color: var(--text-sub); }

    /* Author Widget */
    .profile-widget { text-align: center; }
    .profile-bg { height: 70px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary), var(--secondary)); border-radius: 15px 15px 0 0; margin: -20px -20px 30px -20px; }
    .profile-avatar { width: 80px; height: 80px; border-radius: 50%; border: 4px solid var(--surface); margin: -70px auto 10px; object-fit: cover; }
    .profile-name { font-size: 18px; font-weight: 800; margin-bottom: 5px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 5px; }
    .v-badge { color: #3b82f6; font-size: 14px; }
    .profile-bio { font-size: 12px; color: var(--text-sub); margin-bottom: 15px; }

    /* Required Pages List */
    .legal-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 10px; margin-top: 15px; padding-top: 15px; border-top: 1px solid var(--border); }
    .legal-links a { font-size: 11px; color: var(--text-sub); }
    .legal-links a:hover { color: var(--primary); text-decoration: underline; }

    /* 
    ========================================
    5. SINGLE POST CONTENT
    ========================================
    */
    .post-view { background: var(--surface); border-radius: var(--radius); border: 1px solid var(--border); padding: 40px; }
    /* Post Body Fix */
    .post-body-text { font-size: 17px; line-height: 1.8; color: var(--text); }
    .post-body-text p { margin-bottom: 25px; }
    .post-body-text img { 
        max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 15px; 
        display: block; margin: 30px auto; 
        cursor: zoom-in; transition: transform 0.4s ease, box-shadow 0.4s ease;
    }
    .post-body-text img:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); }

    /* Lightbox System */
    .lyn-lightbox {
        position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;
        background: rgba(11, 13, 17, 0.95);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px); -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        display: none; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
        z-index: 999999; cursor: zoom-out;
        opacity: 0; transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
    }
    .lyn-lightbox.active { display: flex; opacity: 1; }
    .lyn-lightbox img {
        max-width: 90%; max-height: 90%;
        border-radius: 12px;
        transform: scale(0.8); transition: transform 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.34, 1.56, 0.64, 1);
        box-shadow: 0 20px 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
    }
    .lyn-lightbox.active img { transform: scale(1); }

    /* Blogger Comments Styling */
    #comments { margin-top: 50px; padding: 30px; background: var(--surface); border-radius: var(--radius); border: 1px solid var(--border); }
    #comments h4 { font-size: 20px; font-weight: 800; margin-bottom: 25px; }
    .comment-thread li { list-style:none; margin-bottom: 20px; }
    .comment-header { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 700; }
    .comment-header img { width: 35px; height: 35px; border-radius: 50%; }
    .comment-content { font-size: 15px; color: var(--text-sub); line-height: 1.6; padding-left: 45px; }
    #comment-editor { margin-top: 30px; border-radius: 12px; overflow: hidden; }

    /* Share Tooltip simulation in JS */
    .share-toast {
        position: fixed; bottom: 30px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%);
        background: var(--primary); color: #fff; padding: 12px 25px;
        border-radius: 50px; font-weight: 700; font-size: 14px;
        box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.4);
        z-index: 10000; animation: slideUp 0.3s ease;
    }
    @keyframes slideUp { from { bottom: -50px; opacity: 0; } to { bottom: 30px; opacity: 1; } }

    /* Reveal Animation */
    .reveal { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(30px); transition: transform 0.8s cubic-bezier(0.2, 0.8, 0.2, 1), opacity 0.8s ease; will-change: transform, opacity; }
    .reveal.active { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }

    /* Skeleton Loading & Shimmer */
    @keyframes shimmer {
        0% { background-position: -468px 0; }
        100% { background-position: 468px 0; }
    }
    .skeleton {
        background: #1e293b;
        background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #1e293b 0%, #334155 20%, #1e293b 40%, #1e293b 100%);
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-size: 800px 1040px;
        display: inline-block;
        position: relative;
        animation: shimmer 1.5s linear infinite forwards;
    }
    .card-img-wrap {
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
        background: #1e293b; /* Fallback */
    }
    .card-img-wrap::before {
        content: "";
        position: absolute;
        top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;
        background: #1e293b;
        background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #1e293b 0%, #334155 20%, #1e293b 40%, #1e293b 100%);
        background-size: 800px 1040px;
        animation: shimmer 1.5s linear infinite forwards;
        z-index: 1;
        transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
    }
    .card-img-wrap.loaded::before {
        opacity: 0;
        pointer-events: none;
    }
    .card-img-wrap img {
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease;
        z-index: 2;
        position: relative;
        border-radius: 0 !important; /* Force square to fill container rounding */
    }
    .card-img-wrap.loaded img {
        opacity: 1;
    }
    .card-img-wrap .content-overlay { z-index: 5; }


    @media (max-width: 1280px) {
        .app-container { max-width: 100%; }
        .main-grid { grid-template-columns: 240px 1fr 300px; }
        .header-search { width: 300px; }
    }
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .main-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr 300px; }
        .left-side { display: none; }
    }
    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .main-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; margin-top: 85px; gap: 20px; }
        .right-side { display: none; }
        .header-search { display: none; }
        .post-title { font-size: 17px; }
        .card-img-wrap { height: 280px; }
        .post-view { padding: 20px; }
        .content-overlay { bottom: 10px; left: 10px; right: 10px; padding: 12px; }
        .social-card { margin-bottom: 40px; }
    }
    

    
      /* --- ULTIMATE STABLE LAYOUT EDITOR --- */
      body#layout { 
          background: #f8fafc !important; 
          padding: 50px !important;
          font-family: 'Segoe UI', sans-serif !important;
      }
      
      /* Reset all complex CSS from the live site */
      body#layout .left-side, 
      body#layout .right-side, 
      body#layout .content-feed,
      body#layout .app-container,
      body#layout .main-grid {
          position: static !important;
          width: 100% !important;
          max-width: 1000px !important;
          margin: 0 auto !important;
          display: block !important;
          float: none !important;
          height: auto !important;
          overflow: visible !important;
          backdrop-filter: none !important;
          box-shadow: none !important;
      }

      /* Sections: Professional Cards */
      body#layout .section {
          background: #ffffff !important;
          border: 1px solid #e2e8f0 !important;
          border-radius: 12px !important;
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
          padding: 30px !important;
          box-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.05) !important;
          position: relative !important;
      }
      
      body#layout .section::before {
          content: attr(id);
          position: absolute;
          top: -12px; left: 20px;
          background: #4f46e5;
          color: #fff;
          font-size: 11px;
          font-weight: 900;
          padding: 4px 15px;
          border-radius: 6px;
          text-transform: uppercase;
          box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.3);
      }

      /* Widgets: Minimal & Clean */
      body#layout .widget {
          background: #f8fafc !important;
          border: 1px solid #e2e8f0 !important;
          border-radius: 10px !important;
          margin: 15px 0 !important;
          padding: 15px !important;
          transition: 0.3s;
      }
      body#layout .widget:hover { border-color: #4f46e5; }
      
      body#layout .widget h2 {
          font-size: 14px !important;
          color: #1e1b4b !important;
          font-weight: 800 !important;
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
          text-transform: capitalize !important;
      }

      /* Functional Buttons */
      body#layout .add-widget {
          background: #4f46e5 !important;
          color: #fff !important;
          border-radius: 8px !important;
          padding: 8px 18px !important;
          font-weight: 700 !important;
          font-size: 12px !important;
          display: inline-block !important;
          border: none !important;
          cursor: pointer !important;
      }

      /* Hide System Overlays in Editor */
      body#layout .adsense-wrapper,
      body#layout .side-widget,
      body#layout #LayoutSettings {
          position: static !important;
          display: block !important;
          margin: 0 !important;
      }
      /* Developer Signature in Layout Editor (Hard to Remove) */
      body#layout::after {
          content: 'Developed & Secured by George Bahgat \2122';
          position: fixed;
          bottom: 20px; right: 20px;
          background: #4f46e5;
          color: #fff;
          padding: 10px 20px;
          border-radius: 50px;
          font-weight: 900;
          font-size: 14px;
          box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
          z-index: 999999;
          pointer-events: none;
      }

div.style: margin-top:40px; background:var(--bg); border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:15px; padding:20px;

a.style: width:auto; height:50px; border-radius:50px; padding:0 30px; font-weight:800; background:var(--primary); color:#fff; border:none;

div.style: font-size:13px; font-weight:700; line-height:1.4; display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden;
